reviews.review_msg: Colette is probably one of the most intelligent profs I have ever had. She is always willing to go the extra mile for her students, puts a lot of thought into her lectures and her classes in general are always different, interesting and fun. Attendance and participation are huge with her and she's a bit of a hard marker.

fantastic prof, very interesting and like someone else said, quite modest about it.  go to help for the essays, she will help you and lend you books to read for your papers.  really cares about her students too, treats everyone really well. no favorites with her, she gets along with everybody
she's definitely hot and shows the class a lot of pretty pictures ... not sure how much I learnt about lit, though. Like her a lot as a person, not prof
She is great. She has great lectures and seminars. If you can get her for both you'll have a good semester. Take her and Enjoy!
She inlcudes a lot of historical info, and brings in a lot of art.  Really interested in independent studying.
She is somewhat of a fair marker.  She does focus on the biographies of the authors way too much.  Her lectures could be a bit confusing since she's not very clear.  Overall, she's an OK professor
Great prof! really enjoyed her lectures
Great prof.  Interesting and stimulating to creative thought.
